title: Ep 57: TBT to Garden Witch Overalls w/ Kate Baer
itunes:title: Ep 57: TBT to Garden Witch Overalls w/ Kate Baer
itunes:subtitle: Merry Christmas if you celebrate and a happy day off if you don’t! Throwing it back to this past summer when poet Kate Baer joined us to talk all about the Amazon overalls she wears all year round (which we lovingly dubbed the GARDEN WITCH OVERALLS) an...
description:
Merry Christmas if you celebrate and a happy day off if you don’t! Throwing it back to this past summer when poet Kate Baer joined us to talk all about the Amazon overalls she wears all year round (which we lovingly dubbed the GARDEN WITCH OVERALLS) and her NYT Bestselling book of poetry, “What Kind Of Woman”. Also: How we feel about our bodies! We love to talk about our bodies here! Also, Kate reveals the craziest thing she saw in a TJ Maxx dressing room.


Next week is 2021 (?!?!?!!?!?!?!?!?!?!??!) and we’re celebrating with our VERY FIRST LISTENER EPISODE!!!!!!!!! I want to hear from you! Leave a message and tell us all about your favorite product find of 2020 (bonus points if you found it via Gee Thanks!) and what product you’d recommend to all of the listeners. CALL ME! 424-245-0736


(Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there!)


Devour Kate’s book with me: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780063008427 


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • THE Garden Witch Overalls (size up!): https://amzn.to/33c4M5G 
  • The overalls I love (size up!): https://amzn.to/39JSUsM 
  • The Amazon Bathing Suit (size up!) https://amzn.to/39IlJWT 
  • My favorite headband: https://amzn.to/3jYeleH 
  • Birkenstocks: https://fave.co/338Oz1e
  • Similar overalls with more sizes!: https://amzn.to/339F5CL


Follow Kate on Instagram: www.instagram.com/katejbaer 


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 









Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
